item.title: Run PostgreSQL with Custom Configuration
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Using Custom Configuration File KubeDB supports providing custom configuration for PostgreSQL. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run PostgreSQL database with custom configuration. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using minikube.
